Name: Perennial Forget-Me-Not
Description: Tiny blue flowers known to symbolize rememberance and true love.

DescriptionLocalization.es: Pequeñas flores azules conocidas por simbolizar el recuerdo y el amor verdadero.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 기억과 진정한 사랑을 상징하는 것으로 알려진 작은 파란색 꽃.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Kleine blaue Blumen, die bekanntermaßen Erinnerung und wahre Liebe symbolisieren.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: De minuscules fleurs bleues connues pour symboliser le souvenir et le véritable amour.
DescriptionLocalization.hu: Apró kék virágok, amelyek az emlékezést és az igaz szerelmet szimbolizálják.
DescriptionLocalization.it: Piccoli fiori blu noti per simboleggiare il ricordo e il vero amore.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: 記憶と真の愛を象徴する小さな青い花。
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Pequenas flores azuis conhecidas por simbolizar lembrança e amor verdadeiro.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Маленькие голубые цветы, как известно, символизируют память и настоящую любовь.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: Hatırlamayı ve gerçek aşkı simgelediği bilinen minik mavi çiçekler.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 以象征记忆和真爱而闻名的蓝色小花。
